actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-344.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 306 - 80 (Record Vote No: 323).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3663) to amend subtitle IV of title 49, United States Code, to provide for more effective regulations of motor carriers of passengers.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3663 (Motor carriers regulation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 3663) to amend subtitle IV of title 49, United States Code, to provide for more effective regulations of motor carriers of passengers.
